name: Super Space Explorer
description:
This is a small game I made for Ludum Dare 48, where the theme was "deeper and deeper". 

Controls:  A+D or left/right arrows to move, mouse for clicking the start button

This was my first ever solo Godot game. Wanted to do so much more, but learning GDScript took a while. Some things left out were more advanced planets (spawning, color etc), nicer player movement and better start screen. At least this time I added background music, for better or for worse. :D
